summary:
This is a standalone follower mod that will add 3 atronachs in the college of winterhold arcanaeum.

This was only just gonna be the flame and frost atronach but it felt wrong not adding the storm atronach and i was gonna put em inside dragonreach but i hate that place so i moved them to the college of winterhold instead.
descriptionHtml:
I am not very good with these description so imma make it short and simple. I also never made followers before so im not sure if they are too weak or overpowered.

This is a standalone follower mod that will add 3 atronachs in the college of winterhold arcanaeum.

This was only just gonna be the flame and frost atronach but it felt wrong not adding the storm atronach and i was gonna put em inside dragonreach but i hate that place so i moved them to the college of winterhold instead.

They should work fine with EFF, AFT and UFO but im not positive about it.

Flame Atronach - Blaze can wear armor and clothes but its gonna look weird with the neck gap
Frost Atronach - Glacier uses a invisible weapon and shield to make it look like hes attacking with his fists
Storm Atronach - Elector Uses a invisible axe but will rarely use it

Recommanded mods:
SIZE DOES MATTER - NPCs do not rescale shrink resize - less camera restrictions by [b]Mahlzeit88 
[/b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/?
Lets be friends - Make any NPC your follower by [b]nick10840

author: Abbalovesyou
